languages.text: {n}Кассия долго смотрит на вас, а затем ее губы, дрожа, расходятся в сладкой улыбке.{/n} "Сегодня особенная ночь, {name}. Так пусть она запомнится навсегда".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кассия долго смотрит на вас, а затем ее губы, дрожа, расходятся в сладкой улыбке.{/n} "Сегодня особенная ночь, {name}. Так пусть она запомнится навсегда".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Her impossible eyes meet yours, then her lips part in a smile.{/n} "Tonight is a special night, {name}. Let's make sure we never forget it."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия долго смотрит на вас, а затем ее губы, дрожа, расходятся в сладкой улыбке.{/n} "Сегодня особенная ночь, {name}. Так пусть она запомнится навсегда".

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia gives you a long look, and then her trembling lips part in a sweet smile.{/n} "Tonight is a special night, {name}. Let's make sure we never forget it."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia gives you a long look, and then her trembling lips part in a sweet smile.{/n} "Tonight is a special night, {name}. Let's make sure we never forget it."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia gives you a long look, and then her trembling lips part in a sweet smile.{/n} "Tonight is a special night, {name}. Let's make sure we never forget it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Her impossible eyes meet yours, then her lips part in a smile.{/n} "Tonight is a special night, {name}. Let's make sure we never forget it."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅红宝石般的眼睛凝视着你，唇角露出了笑容。{/n}“这是个值得纪念的夜晚，{name}。我们可以做些永生难忘的事情。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her impossible eyes meet yours, then her lips part in a smile.{/n} "Tonight is a special night, {name}. Let's make sure we never forget it."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅深情地凝视着你，颤抖的双唇露出了甜美的笑容。{/n}“这是个值得纪念的夜晚，{name}。我们可以做些永生难忘的事情。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ihre unmöglichen Augen suchen deinen Blick, ehe ein Lächeln ihre Lippen umspielt.{/n} "Heute ist eine besondere Nacht, {name}. Sorgen wir dafür, dass wir sie niemals vergessen."
languages.original_text: {n}Her impossible eyes meet yours, then her lips part in a smile.{/n} "Tonight is a special night, {name}. Let's make sure we never forget it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre unmöglichen Augen suchen deinen Blick, ehe ein Lächeln ihre Lippen umspielt.{/n} "Heute ist eine besondere Nacht, {name}. Sorgen wir dafür, dass wir sie niemals vergessen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Elle plante son regard surnaturel dans le vôtre avant d'esquisser un sourire.{/n} « C'est une nuit spéciale, {name}. Tâchons de la rendre inoubliable. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her impossible eyes meet yours, then her lips part in a smile.{/n} "Tonight is a special night, {name}. Let's make sure we never forget it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia vous regarde longuement, puis ses lèvres tremblantes affichent un sourire affectueux.{/n} « C'est une nuit spéciale, {name}. Tâchons de la rendre inoubliable. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sus ojos imposibles se cruzan con los tuyos y sus labios se entreabren en una sonrisa.{/n} «Hoy es una noche especial, {name}. Asegurémonos de que sea inolvidable».
languages.original_text: {n}Her impossible eyes meet yours, then her lips part in a smile.{/n} "Tonight is a special night, {name}. Let's make sure we never forget it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus ojos imposibles se cruzan con los tuyos y sus labios se entreabren en una sonrisa.{/n} «Hoy es una noche especial, {name}. Asegurémonos de que sea inolvidable».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは、こちらをせがむような目で見つめ、微笑んで唇を開く。{/n}「今夜は特別な夜です、{name}様。忘れられないひと時にしましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Her impossible eyes meet yours, then her lips part in a smile.{/n} "Tonight is a special night, {name}. Let's make sure we never forget it."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは、こちらをせがむような目で見つめ、微笑んで唇を開く。{/n}「今夜は特別な夜です、{name}様。忘れられないひと時にしましょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Her impossible eyes meet yours, then her lips part in a smile.{/n} "Tonight is a special night, . Let's make sure we never forget it."

languages.text: {n}Güzel gözleri seninkilerle birleşiyor, dudakları bir tebessümle aralanıyor.{/n} "Bu çok özel bir gece {name}. Hiç unutmayacağımız bir gece."
languages.original_text: {n}Her impossible eyes meet yours, then her lips part in a smile.{/n} "Tonight is a special night, {name}. Let's make sure we never forget it."
